comment:
[This is my first attempt at annotating a game and I feel nervous about
my analysis especially with Simon being the new champion!]

moves: 1. e4 g6 2. d4 Bg7 3. Nf3 d6 4. Nc3 Nf6 5. Be2 O-O 6. O-O c6 7. h3 Qc7 8. Bf4 Nh5 9. Be3 e5 10. Qd2 Nd7 11. a4 Re8 12. Rad1 exd4 13. Nxd4 Nhf6 14. f3 a6 15. Rf2 d5 16. exd5 Nxd5 17. Nxd5 cxd5 18. a5 Ne5 19. Bf4 b5 20. axb6 Qxb6 21. b3 Bb7 22. Be3 Nc6
comment:
[Until here, I thought the position was equal, but after 22...Nc6 things
slowly go downhill for Black. Better was 22...Qc7 23.f4 Nc6 24.Nxc6 Qxc6 25.
Bf3 Qc7]

comment: [If 25...d3 then 26.Bxd3 Bd4 27.Bd6+ Ne7 28.Bc4 Be3 29.Qc3 is good for White.]
